         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078119">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078119">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078119" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078120">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078120">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078120">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078120">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078120" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078121">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078121">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078121">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078121">
          <div id="boxatt17078121" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130218">
              <a id="link_20130218" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130218,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription. Several hundred online encyclopedias by reputable publishers. Good for topic-finding, narrowing, and bibliographies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130223">
              Encyclopedia Judaica (2nd ed., 2007)
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Trexler Library Reference Collection 296.03 E56j)
               <br />
               Signed entries by invited contributors. Good for topic-finding and topic-narrowing.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078122">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078122">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078122">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078122">
          <div id="boxatt17078122" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130206">
              <a id="link_20130206" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130206,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Available by library subscription. Catalog of books and documents in research libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Online books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078146">
          <div id="boxatt17078146" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130248">
              <a id="link_20130248" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130248,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973860}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Offers previews of books, with link to interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

       <div id="wrapbox17078123">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078123">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078123">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078123">
          <div id="boxatt17078123" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130208">
              <a id="link_20130208" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130208,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130209">
              <a id="link_20130209" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130209,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130279">
              <a id="link_20130279" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130279,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for American history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130286">
              <a id="link_20130286" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130286,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for European history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130290">
              <a id="link_20130290" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=jph" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130290,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767659}); ">
               Index to Jewish Periodicals
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for scholarship on Jewish religion and culture. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130295">
              <a id="link_20130295" href="http://jnul.huji.ac.il/rambi/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130295,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20130295}); ">
               RambiWeb
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free index of scholarship on Jewish religion and culture.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078124">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078124">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078124">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078124">
          <div id="boxatt17078124" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130212">
              <a id="link_20130212" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130212,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130324">
              <a id="link_20130324" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130324,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130334">
              <a id="link_20130334" href="http://vos.ucsb.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130334,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Sexuality in Judaism ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20130334}); ">
               Voice of the Shuttle
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642487" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078125">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078125">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078125">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078125">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies (very similar to a source review), visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            Online Writing Lab
           </a>
           for a
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/general/gl_annotatedbib.html">
            definition
           </a>
           of an annotation and
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            samples
           </a>
           using APA and MLA styles.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078125" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078126">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078126">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078126">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078126">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078126" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
